parameter.name: function
parameter.label: Regular Expression
parameter.description: Regular expression to be applied on the state. Should contain a capture group whose outcome will be the result. For example: .*=(\\d*.\\d*).* extracts the 23.5 from temp=23.5°C

parameter.name: sourceFormat
parameter.label: State Formatter
parameter.description: How to format the state on the channel before transforming it, i.e. %s or %.1f °C (default is %s).
